page_content:
Corporate 
Governance 
Veracyte is committed to sound corporate 
governance practices that strengthen the account -
ability of our management and Board of Directors 
and promote the long-term interests of our 
stakeholders.
Our Board has established four committees, all 
members of which are independent. Learn more 
about each committee in the charters below:
• Audit
• Compensation
• Nominating and Corporate Governance
• Regulatory and Compliance
17
